org.sakaiproject.component.section.facade.impl.standalone

Class AuthzStandaloneImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.dao.support.DaoSupport
      • org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.support.HibernateDaoSupport
        • org.sakaiproject.component.section.facade.impl.standalone.AuthzStandaloneImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Authz, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

    public class AuthzStandaloneImpl
extends org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.support.HibernateDaoSupport
implements Authz
    A standalone, hibernate-based implementation of the Authz facade.
    Author:
    Josh Holtzman

      • isSectionAssignable

        public boolean isSectionAssignable(String userUid,
                          String siteContext)
        Description copied from interface: Authz
        Returns whether the user can be assigned to specific sections. In general, a TA can be assigned to a section, while an instructor can not (since they are site-wide administrators).
        Specified by:
        isSectionAssignable in interface Authz
        Returns:

      • getRoleDescription

        public String getRoleDescription(String userUid,
                        String siteContext)
        Description copied from interface: Authz
        Returns the role description for a user in a particular context. This isn't strictly authz, but it doesn't seem to require its own facade.
